ðŸ“– Summary: Liam ERD is an open-source tool that automatically generates beautiful, interactive Entity Relationship (ER) diagrams from your database schemas. It simplifies the visualization of complex database structures with a user-friendly interface, seamless reverse engineering, and high performance for projects of all sizes.
